items.sentence: This time it seems as if Tom is telling the truth.
The population has doubled in the last five years.
Why do you think it was Tom who wrote that letter?
I wonder if Tom knows that Mary is coming with me.
Tom was surprised how difficult it was to do that.
Did Tom tell you it would be difficult to do that?
It might not have been as hard as Tom said it was.
It may not be as hard to do as you think it'll be.
Tom expected Mary to explain the situation to him.
Tom said there wasn't a thing he could do to help.
